name: STOP THE COUNT!
description:
Hello young Vote-counter,

thank you so much for volunteering to help count all the ballot votes. As you are surely aware, the supreme leader Ronald Dump is taking over the country once again and it is in our hands to save this country. We must help our lizard savior Johny Buythem to get more then 50% votes to become the supreme leader! Count all his votes, and destroy all Dump ones. We are COUNTING on you! And beware of the cunning Eagle!

How does it work:

You play as Vote-counter, the person responsible for sorting vote ballots. But you have a more important job! You have 60 seconds to make sure Johny Buythem wins this election. For that you need to quickly decide whether the ballot is marked as Johny´s and needs to be swiped left into the mailing box or Dump´s vote and thus sent right, directly into the shredding machine. But watch out! The cunning eagle is watching all your decisions and will let you know when you make a mistake. Can you make sure that Johny gets more than 50% of votes and becomes the next supreme leader? Or will the world fall in chaos under the supremacy of Ronald Dump. That´s for you to decide! And you can always compare your results with agents in other states.

This game features:

  • Ballot sorting
  • Two leaders
  • Cunning eagle
  • MORE ballot sorting...with a twist ;)
  • And more!

Controls:

OR To swipe ballot left into the ballot box

OR To swipe ballot right into the shredder box
